description: React component for browsing and viewing details of containers and items related to a specific connection identified by params.id.

methods.name: loadContainers
methods.description: Fetches and sets the list of containers for the current connection.

methods.name: loadItems
methods.description: Fetches and sets the list of items within a selected container.

methods.name: loadItemDetail
methods.description: Fetches and sets detailed info and comments for a selected item.
